field.default: This feature is still under development, it supports searching key-words in title and description and also supports searching custom fields: select, textarea, text, other non-core fields are supported as raw values only. Core fields are supported but incompletely, as row values only, DO NOT enable for title & description since they are already search automatically. Other fields maybe supported later. After enabling advanced search mode for a field, go to search index and then click purge and index to rerender fields display and thus update the index
